co.cask.tigon.internal.guava
Class ClassPath

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.tigon.internal.guava.ClassPath

@Beta
public final class ClassPath
extends Object

Scans the source of a ClassLoader and finds all loadable classes and resources.

Since:
14.0
Author:
Ben Yu

Nested Class Summary
static class ClassPath.ClassInfo
          Represents a class that can be loaded through ClassPath.ClassInfo.load().
static class ClassPath.ResourceInfo
          Represents a class path resource that can be either a class file or any other resource file loadable from the class path.
 
Method Summary
static ClassPath from(ClassLoader classloader)
          Returns a ClassPath representing all classes and resources loadable from classloader and its parent class loaders.
static ClassPath from(ClassLoader classloader, com.google.common.base.Predicate<URI> predicate)
          Returns a ClassPath representing all classes and resources loadable from classloader and its parent class loaders that satisfy the given predicate.
static ClassPath from(URI uri, ClassLoader classLoader)
          Returns a ClassPath representing all classes and resources loadable from the given URI.
 com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ClassInfo> getAllClasses()
          Returns all classes loadable from the current class path.
 com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ClassInfo> getAllClassesRecursive(String packageName)
          Returns all top level classes whose package name is packageName or starts with packageName followed by a '.'.
 com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ResourceInfo> getResources()
          Returns all resources loadable from the current class path, including the class files of all loadable classes but excluding the "META-INF/MANIFEST.MF" file.
 com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ClassInfo> getTopLevelClasses()
          Returns all top level classes loadable from the current class path.
 com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ClassInfo> getTopLevelClasses(String packageName)
          Returns all top level classes whose package name is packageName.
 com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ClassInfo> getTopLevelClassesRecursive(String packageName)
          Returns all top level classes whose package name is packageName or starts with packageName followed by a '.'.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

from

public static ClassPath from(ClassLoader classloader)
                      throws IOException
Returns a ClassPath representing all classes and resources loadable from classloader and its parent class loaders.

Currently only URLClassLoader and only file:// urls are supported.

Throws:
IOException - if the attempt to read class path resources (jar files or directories) failed.

from

public static ClassPath from(ClassLoader classloader,
                             com.google.common.base.Predicate<URI> predicate)
                      throws IOException
Returns a ClassPath representing all classes and resources loadable from classloader and its parent class loaders that satisfy the given predicate.

Currently only URLClassLoader and only file:// urls are supported.

Throws:
IOException - if the attempt to read class path resources (jar files or directories) failed.

from

public static ClassPath from(URI uri,
                             ClassLoader classLoader)
                      throws IOException
Returns a ClassPath representing all classes and resources loadable from the given URI. The ClassLoader of all the ClassPath.ResourceInfo in the result will be the given classLoader.

Throws:
IOException

getResources

public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ResourceInfo> getResources()
Returns all resources loadable from the current class path, including the class files of all loadable classes but excluding the "META-INF/MANIFEST.MF" file.

getAllClasses

public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ClassInfo> getAllClasses()
Returns all classes loadable from the current class path.

Since:
16.0

getAllClassesRecursive

public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ClassInfo> getAllClassesRecursive(String packageName)
Returns all top level classes whose package name is packageName or starts with packageName followed by a '.'.

getTopLevelClasses

public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ClassInfo> getTopLevelClasses()
Returns all top level classes loadable from the current class path.

getTopLevelClasses

public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ClassInfo> getTopLevelClasses(String packageName)
Returns all top level classes whose package name is packageName.

getTopLevelClassesRecursive

public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<ClassPath.ClassInfo> getTopLevelClassesRecursive(String packageName)
Returns all top level classes whose package name is packageName or starts with packageName followed by a '.'.
